attributes.additional_details: I and Thousands of others believe that these should be allowed on roads and having the same rules as push bikes, The Highway Code, Department Of Transportation: Rules for cyclists (59 to 82). Obeying the (Rules for cyclists), Speed limits, Crossings, School zones, 1-Way streets etc.
attributes.background: Make E-Scooters legal (As long as the E-Scooter has: Headlight/s, Tail light/s, Indicators and horn, And most of all. Protective gear. These are an amazing piece of technology for commuting to work, socialising with friend's and getting from A to B.

rejection.details: Change e-scooters legislation to allow use on roads & pavements legally: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651169
